name: Island of Ian BETA
description:
BETA version, I uploaded this so I can get some support from the itch.io community. If you can play this game and donate that would be greatly appreciated. I am a indie game developer with a zero source of income except for this, so if you can donate I would greatly appreciate it. 

Links:

Youtbe - Youtube Channel

Twitter - Twitter

Scratch - -Chamelian-

Not available for mobile users currently

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Arrows and WASD - to move

e - equip/unequip weapon

Click - attack

z - to advance cutscenes

^ or w - up

v or s - down

< or a - left 

> - d - right

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Story:

A young traveler mysteriously ended up in the middle of a island, according to the inhabitants of the island they are on the Island of Ian. But the inhabitants also tells of a strange legend about a evil spirit that lives inside the caves and once awakened it will destroy the island and turn all of the inhabitants into flesh eating monsters! But what people don't know is that the evil spirit is already awake...

So traveler you must journey into the Island and discover secrets within to stop this evil spirit, so set forth into the 

                                 Island of Ian
